name: Booty Hunters
description:
Booty Hunters is a nautical adventure of puzzles, pirates, and plunder! Find the treasure in each level before you run out of supplies, and combat the many threats of the great open sea!

Your actions are limited in each level - use a combination of inspecting quadrants, navigating the map, and digging up loot to find the treasure before you run out of time.

Encounter a variety of different events out in the great blue - seek supplies at shipwrecks, hints toward the treasure at islands, and face the threats of whirlpools, rogue pirate crews and more.

Controls:

Mouse - Clicking on buttons and tabs

Arrow Keys - Move your ship across the map

A game jam game made in 1 week by:

 Ryan Eaton (https://ryaneaton.itch.io/)

J Hendy (https://josiah-hendy.itch.io/) 

Billy Marsh
